title: Aldi shoppers rave about $10 Lacura Revitalise Day Cream that's good as brands triple the price
text:
Shoppers are raving about an Aldi moisturiser that they say are just as good as brands costing more than three times the retail price.

The budget beauty Lacura range has been selling out in record time, with customers clearing out shelves within minutes of the re-launch in-stores.

And Australian mothers are comparing the $9.99 Lacura Revitalise Day Cream to $33.50 Olay's Revitalising Hydration Day Face Cream, and $33 L'oreal Paris Revitalift Face Cream Day.

Australian mothers are raving about the $9.99 Lacura Revitalise Day Cream (pictured) that's just as good as brands costing more than three times the retail price

'Thought I’d share this product from Aldi. It's good on the skin. I've been using ALDI moisturiser and night cream for over a year now,' Ann said.

'And I can't see any difference between Lacura and Olay or L'Oréal. They are all the same as far as I'm concerned, just cheaper.'

Other customers also shared their glowing reviews, with many revealing the cream has become part of the daily skincare regime.

'I love love love this cream. My skin is lush and has been pimple free and beautiful since using it,' Ashleigh Walker said.

Shoppers are raving about an Aldi moisturiser that they say are just as good as brands costing more than three times the retail price (pictured left: L'oreal Paris Revitalift Face Cream Day)

Australian mothers are comparing the budget product to $33.50 Olay's Revitalising Hydration Day Face Cream (left), and $33 L'oreal Paris Revitalift Face Cream Day (right)

Carol said: 'I have been using this cream for over a year and I love it.'

Lyn said: I have used this for many years others seem to irritate my skin.'

Michele said: 'I love it, it really suits my skin.'

Others recommended other products, including $9.99 Lacura light tinted moisturiser and eye cream.

'I have the tinted moisturiser and love it. Its a light tinted moisturiser. It doesn't leave my skin greasy like some others do,' one said.

Another said: 'I am in love with the eye cream. Not so fazed on the serum, but the eye cream gets high rating from me.'
description: Australian shoppers are raving about an Aldi moisturiser that they say are just as good as brands costing more than three times the retail price.
authors: Cindy Tran For Daily Mail Australia
